code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});export const authAPI={register:data=>api.post('/auth/register',data),login:data=>api.post('/auth/login',data),getMe:()=>api.get('/auth/me'),updateProfile:data=>api.put('/auth/profile',data)};export const habitsAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/habits'),create:data=>api.post('/habits',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/habits/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/habits/".concat(id)),complete:(id,date)=>api.post("/habits/".concat(id,"/complete"),{date}),uncomplete:(id,date)=>api.post("/habits/".concat(id,"/uncomplete"),{date}),getStats:()=>api.get('/habits/stats')};export const tasksAPI={getAll:params=>api.get('/tasks',{params}),create:data=>api.post('/tasks',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/tasks/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/tasks/".concat(id)),getStats:()=>api.get('/tasks/stats')};export const statsAPI={getCombined:()=>api.get('/stats')};export const aiAPI={getSuggestions:()=>api.get('/ai/suggestions'),chat:message=>api.post('/ai/chat',{message})};export const reportsAPI={getWeekly:()=>api.get('/reports/weekly'),getMonthly:()=>api.get('/reports/monthly')};export const moodAPI={create:data=>api.post('/mood',data),getAll:params=>api.get('/mood',{params}),getInsights:()=>api.get('/mood/insights')};export const collaborationAPI={shareTask:(taskId,data)=>api.post("/collaboration/tasks/".concat(taskId,"/share"),data),shareHabit:(habitId,data)=>api.post("/collaboration/habits/".concat(habitId,"/share"),data),getSharedTasks:()=>api.get('/collaboration/tasks/shared'),getSharedHabits:()=>api.get('/collaboration/habits/shared'),removeCollaborator:(taskId,userId)=>api.delete("/collaboration/tasks/".concat(taskId,"/collaborators/").concat(userId))};export const leaderboardAPI={getLeaderboard:params=>api.get('/leaderboard',{params}),updateScore:data=>api.post('/leaderboard/update',data)};export const twoFactorAPI={generateOTP:email=>api.post('/2fa/generate-otp',{email}),enable:()=>api.post('/2fa/enable'),disable:()=>api.post('/2fa/disable'),verifyOTP:(email,otp)=>api.post('/2fa/verify-otp',{email,otp})};export const calendarAPI={getAuthUrl:()=>api.get('/calendar/auth-url'),sync:()=>api.post('/calendar/sync'),disconnect:()=>api.post('/calendar/disconnect')};export const backupAPI={export:()=>api.get('/backup/export'),import:data=>api.post('/backup/import',{backupData:data})};export const templatesAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/templates'),apply:templateId=>api.post("/templates/".concat(templateId,"/apply")),initialize:()=>api.post('/templates/initialize')};export const gamificationAPI={getStats:()=>api.get('/gamification/stats'),awardXP:data=>api.post('/gamification/award-xp',data)};export const locationAPI={getNearby:params=>api.get('/location/nearby',{params}),updateHomeLocation:data=>api.post('/location/home-location',data)};export default api;
